Package io.patriot_framework.network.simulator.api.model.devices.router

Class RouterImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.patriot_framework.network.simulator.api.model.devices.router.RouterImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Device, Router, EnvironmentPart
    public class RouterImpl
extends Object
implements Router
    RouterImpl class represents docker container built as router with network-control apis.
